channel.title: Drops OMFG this Is GAYYY!
channel.description:
Ok i Have A Npcdrops.cfg and when i kill the guy no drops! omfg... this sucks look
[img]http://aycu29.webshots.com/image/43348/2004546022680388151_rs.jpg[/img]
and l00k!
npcdrop = 178 1143 1 27 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 995 7500 85 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 1333 1 100 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 1371 1 45 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 1313 1 39 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 1115 1 47 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 1434 1 24 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 2583 1 23 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 4092 1 34 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop. npcdrop = 178 7332 1 75 //chicken drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop.
thats the things they drop.. not even the 100 percent drops show..

public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

the last one is the drops dont worry about that
